amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding in the Weapons Activities account (for the B61 nuclear weapon) by $23.7 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds in the Weapons Activities account by $23,700,000 and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 227 (Roll no. 332).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 227 (Roll no. 332).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Quigley.
